DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety Timolol 0.5 % solution Brinzolamide 1 % give twice daily add Travoprost 0.004 % give evening .
DOC.brief_title: Study Brinzolamide Timolol When Added Travoprost Primary Open-angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patients treat prostaglandin analogue monotherapy ( exclude unoprostone ) intraocular pressure 19 32 mmHg 08:00 hour . Under 18 year
